state: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First thing I need you to do is to make an attempt to travel north. That done, make an attempt to go to the north. And then, go north. After that, go east. And then, venture south. If you can manage that, make an effort to head south. After that, move east. Okay, and then, make an attempt to head east. Then, make an effort to go to the east. Once you succeed at that, take a trip north. Then, head north. And then, go to the west. Following that, attempt to go to the south. And then, pick-up the berry from the floor of the spare room. That's it! -= Cookery =- You find yourself in a cookery. A normal kind of place. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. > -= Cookery =-0/1
